{"result":{"text":"table attributes columnalign left end attributes row cell text  Friction force between wedge and block is internal i.e. will not change motion of COM. Friction force on  end text end cell row cell text  the wedge by ground is external and causes COM to move towards right. Gravitational force (mg) on  end text end cell row cell text  block brings it downward hence COM comes down.  end text end cell end table"},"status":"ok"}
